solution_line_template: She is making {total_water} ounces of water because {num_people} x {cup_size} = <<{num_people}*{cup_size}={total_water}>>{total_water}
She needs {ounces_of_tea_needed} ounces of tea because {total_water} / {mom_cup_size} = <<{total_water}/{mom_cup_size}={ounces_of_tea_needed}>>{ounces_of_tea_needed}
